subtitle:
1 00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:36,500 chheng-san le̍k-chúi sûi gún lâi
Green mountains and clear waters follow us 2 00:01:37,000 --> 00:01:44,500 Bí-lē san-hô lán só͘ ài
The beautiful mountains and rivers are what we love 3 00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:54,000 m̄-thang hō͘ lâng lâi phò-hāi
Let us not allow anyone to destroy them 4 00:01:55,500 --> 00:02:03,000 Tâi-oân tu̍t-chhut Tiong-iong Soaⁿ-me̍h
Taiwan stands out with the Central Mountain Range 5 00:02:04,000 --> 00:02:11,500 hong-hong sio-liâm chhah-ji̍p hûn lāi
Peaks connected to peaks, piercing into the clouds 6 00:02:12,000 --> 00:02:19,500 Gio̍k-san, A-lí kàu Kî-lâi
From Jade Mountain, Alishan to Qilai Mountain 7 00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:29,000 che sī miā-kin ê só͘-chāi
This is where our life-roots lie 8 00:02:30,500 --> 00:02:34,500 Tâi-oân sī seⁿ lán ê só͘-chāi
(Spoken) Taiwan is the place that gave birth to us 9 00:02:35,000 --> 00:02:37,500 kám-liām kám-un chāi gún sim-lāi
(Spoken) Gratitude and thanksgiving are in our hearts 10 00:02:38,000 --> 00:02:40,500 Hù-chhut chêng-ì, hù-chhut ài
(Spoken) Giving our affection, giving our love 11 00:02:41,000 --> 00:02:44,500 tāi-tāi hoe-lúi tāi-tāi chai
(Spoken) Generations of flowers are planted by generations 12 00:02:45,000 --> 00:02:47,500 Tâi-oân ê sì-piⁿ lóng sī hái

vocab.def: to be born; to give birth (A2)
in the heart; in the mind (A2)
